extendedInfo.description: Welcome to the official mobile app for New Hope Pride! This app is a joint development of EDGE Media Network and New Hope Celebrates; it's designed to be a comprehensive guide to our annual Pride celebration, including events, photos and interactive features.News :: Stay in the know regarding all the latest news from New Hope Pride right on your mobile device! Including announcements, hot event notifications and hotel specials.Photos :: View official photos from EDGE and New Hope Pride's official photographers.Events :: The New Hope Pride events calendar is a comprehensive list of what's going on during the year.Sponsors :: We love our sponsors - so should you! Get information on the organizations that make New Hope Pride possible.
